name: research-validator
description: Validate scientific claims in the MemoryForge working memory enhancement app against peer-reviewed evidence. Uses PubMed and BioMCP MCP servers to search biomedical literature. Enforces Evidence-Based Medicine (EBM) hierarchy, tracks every claim in EVIDENCE.md with DOI/PMID links, effect sizes, sample sizes, and confidence ratings. Zero tolerance for unverified health claims.
